downloadTitle: Register to Start Using Microsoft Services for the First Time
downloadDescription: This guide will describe how to register for a new account.

downloadFile.name: Register to Start Using Microsoft Services for the First Time.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/1/a/e/1ae691e7-13b9-4551-bca2-fb5b5726cbbf/Register to Start Using Microsoft Services for the First Time.pdf

detailsSection: When you register for a new account and activate new services, Microsoft will send an email to the Online Services Manager asking them to activate the new services. This activation email contains a Register link that will take the Online Services Manager to the Office 365 Portal, where activation occurs. This guide will describe how to register for a new account.
detailsSection_file_name: Register to Start Using Microsoft Services for the First Time.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
Supported Operating System 
Windows 10 , Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows Vista, Windows XP 
You must have Adobe Reader installed on your computer to view these files.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to open or save these files to your computer.
